component.name: ldc2
component.summary: LDC DLang compiler SDK Extension for the Freedesktop Flatpak runtime

description.p: The LDC2 project provides a portable D programming language compiler with modern optimization and code generation capabilities. The compiler uses the official DMD frontend to support the latest version of D2, and relies on the LLVM Core libraries for code generation.
